Version History

Previous versions of META-UI are available through our Content Delivery Network (CDN). However, we recommend using the latest version for the most up-to-date functionality.

  
    // CSS
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="//cdn.metalab.csun.edu/meta-ui/css/meta-ui.css">

    // JavaScript
    <script src="//cdn.metalab.csun.edu/meta-ui/js/meta-ui.js"></script>

Note: Specific versions and information about their features can be found on Github.
